about_the_game:
Lawless Lands

Herding Hound DLC:
  • New Companion - The Sagerovian Herding Hound!
  • New Companion Class- The Herding Hound! Smaller and faster than the Crossian Warhounds, these herding hounds are great companions for hunters and trackers!
  • Your Hound - Your Way! Name your new herding hound as you wish and train them as you see fit!

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO ACTIVATE THIS PACK, YOU MUST GO TO THE VILLAGE OF AVERIN TO THE FAR EAST OF PYRSHEN! YOU CAN DO THIS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
